example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <label htmlFor="names">Given names</label>
    <Illustration name="Success" />
    <InputField placeholder="Sofia Cruz" id="names" />
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Accessibility
info.description: If you need to separate the label from the input, match the for prop on the label with the id props on the input field. Never leave the input field without a connected label.
